summary: This memorandum details a covert operation to conduct audio surveillance on Manuel F. ARTIME Buesa, a leader of the Cuban Exile Group, during his visit to Washington, D.C. The operation involves installing microphones in a safehouse where Artime will be billeted and monitored. The memo outlines the logistical challenges, equipment procurement, and coordination with various CIA departments to ensure the surveillance is technically feasible and discreet.
title: Manuel F. ARTIME Buesa
